title: Safety Pin
description:
A silver safety pin or clip, as used to fasten fabric. Generally shown clasped at a 45° angle, with its spring at the lower left.

May be used for various content concerning arts, crafts, and sewing. Not to be confused with ðŸ“Ž Paperclip.
apple_vendor_description: The safety pin emoji on Apple devices presents a polished metallic sheen, rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting. Its smooth, rounded edges and subtle highlights give it a tactile, almost tangible quality. This emoji, appearing as a classic silver safety pin, conveys a sense of security, mending, or a quick fix in digital communication.
